title: how do i splitpush
body: should I put wards in the enemy in the jungle so I don't die

replies.body:
Ward jungle, kill minions, kill towers, don't die.

enemy team tries to kill you, run, go back after they leave...

Rinse repeat, win game
more debatable is 'when' to split push

Run down lane and die over and over while ignoring your team.
If they demand help in teamfights, say you are splitpushing to win the game.
Know where the enemies are, if they go into the jungle or something then leave/recall
Also pray that your team actually takes objectives when they send 4 people to kill you.
as long as you don't die and applying pressure you are doing I right
